headlines.description: Luis Alberto's second-half equaliser earned Lazio a 1-1 draw with AS Roma in a fast and furious Rome derby in Serie A on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lazio, Roma draw in 'spectacular' Rome derby

headlines.description: Romelu Lukaku's second-half penalty earned Inter Milan a 2-1 victory at Cagliari in Serie A on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lukaku subjected to racial abuse in Inter win

venue.fullName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare
